articles.title: Mumps cases rise in Delhi, NCR: Watch out for these top symptoms; preventive tips - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Amidst the summer heat, the rise in mumps cases in Delhi-NCR has raised concern. Here are signs and symptoms you must know along with preventive tips. | Health
articles.content: After an outbreak in Kerala, mumps cases are now on rise in Delhi, NCR and mostly affecting children from the age group of 6-7 years. The viral infection caused by paramyxovirus leads to swollen face… [+5807 chars]

articles.title: Bird flu in Texas has spread to some workers - Fortune
articles.description: Farmers have been hesitant to allow health officials onto their land because of the "stigma" of bird flu, another vet said.
